page.title: 20Whitley School - continued
page.content: All the three classses use the environ ment in their work and make visits to places of interest. We have Sports' day in July and produce a magazine collection of the pupils' work. We now have a Bookshop in the new Library and we can buy our own selection of books. Last year the house attached to the school was redeveloped by the L.E.A. and is now a classroom and library downstairs and administrative offices upstairs. We are making an environ- mental garden for science work near the old pear tree at the back of the school. Parents come into school to help us and to take us on visits. They hold a Sale and Coffee Evening in the Autumn Term to raise money for the School Fund.We always work hard for at least one Charity each year. When we are ll years old we move to Leftwich or Frodsham High Schools.
